content: into the nearest stitch gap on the body take a length of gray yarn to sew the other side of the chest plate to the body secure row 1 of the chest plate to the body as well tie off on the underside and weave in the ends sew the gorget to the cape front and chest plate sew the gorget through upper corners of the cape front going through both that piece and the chest plate with gray yarn bring the needle up and out of the stitch gaps directly below where the gorget and the cape front were sewn together capes blue under cape with j/10-6 00 mm hook and blue yarn chain 20 row 1 blodc into third chain from hook do not count chain 2 as a blodc 17 blodc turn = 18 blodc row 2 5 chain 2 do not count as double_crochet double_crochet in same st 17 double_crochet turn = 18 double_crochet bobble weave-in the bobble tail rotate the cape so the starting chain is on top sew the beginning tail to the upper corner of the cape front take a length of yarn and sew the end of the beginning chain to the other side of the cape front tie the knots on the cape front tie two overhand knots side-by-side very close to the fabric then make a third overhand knot to bring the two smaller knots together to create a larger bulkier knot take the tail and bring it back down into the same stitch gap it originally exited and weave the end into the gorget repeat on the other side of the cape front red cape with j/10-6 00 mm hook and red yarn chain 17 row 1 blodc into third chain from hook do not count chain 2 as blodc 14 blodc turn = 15 blodc row 2 5 chain 2 do not count as double_crochet double_crochet in same st 14 double_crochet turn = 15 double_crochet bobble weave-in bobble tail darksol diminutive devil king 9 rotate the red cape so the starting chain is on top sew the beginning tail to the top of the third double_crochet of the blue cape take a length of red yarn to repeat on the other side of the cape with gray yarn and secure the center of both capes to the underside of the backplate to reduce sagging weave-in the ends and there you have it one palm-sized devil king ready to create colossal world-ending calamity … unless you can stop him thanks for reading darksol
